messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering Foyer.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxillary Base.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Lab.

messages.author: Cadence Bullard (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Smashed lights being found around the station! Who is this vandal, and will our top-of-the-line security team be able to find the suspect in time?! I'll keep you all updated as the situation develops!</font>

messages.author: Cadence Bullard (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Rudely ignored by our very own HOS, Jhonson Lutherfield! As you may be aware, there is someone on station destroying lights. When I tried to confront Lutherfield about this matter, he turned his back. Perhaps he is on the suspect's trail, or perhaps he commited the crime himself! Can we trust our own security team?</font>

messages.author: Cadence Bullard (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Pepsiman - Station Hero! A selfless man by the name of Pepsiman has taken it upon himself to repace our smashed light bulbs! Take that, creature of darkness!</font>

messages.author: Cadence Bullard (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Station starved! Due to the lack of a chef, our station is without food! How will our crew be able to work under these conditions? Will we be able to find a solution to this crisis?! We can only hope for the best!</font>

messages.author: Cadence Bullard (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Pepsiman saves us once more! Soon after submitting my last story, I witnessed The Amazing Pepsiman in the kitchen, cooking! Crisis averted thanks once again to Pepsiman! Is he the hero that this station needs?</font>
